protein.specific_function: Involved in the ubiquitin-dependent proteolytic pathway in conjunction with the 26S proteasome. Deubiquinates the androgen receptor and regulates the androgen receptor signaling pathway

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on ester bonds

reference.reference_text: Wang PJ, McCarrey JR, Yang F, Page DC: An abundance of X-linked genes expressed in spermatogonia. Nat Genet. 2001 Apr;27(4):422-6.
